++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Elle est bleue, elle est belle, surtout ele est petite.
Et nous ne la quitterons pas.
Albert Jacquard

Earth From Above
aka La Terre vue du ciel
By
French photographer Yann Arthus-Bertrand.


Earth From Above is a stunning portrait of our planet.
French photographer Yann Arthus-Bertrand has managed to capture the awe, natural wonder and raw spectacle of the world that we inhabit. Since his photographic exhibition first opened in Paris, 2000, Earth From Above has toured more then thirty countries and been seen by over fifty million people.

Now the experience has come to DVD.

With digital clarity, the DVD of Earth From Above enables the viewer to immerse themselves in the beauty and wonder of our world at the touch of a button.

An ode to the vital reconciliation between Man and Nature, this film invites the viewer to reflect on the changes taking place on our planet, and the repercussions of these changes on future inhabitants. One by one, the stunning images reveal not only the beauty of the Earth, but also the impact we ourselves have made on our fragile planet.


Find the places via Google Earth: http://earth.google.com/intl/pt-BR/earthfromabove/

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Elle est bleue, elle est belle, surtout ele est petite.
Et nous ne la quitterons pas.
Albert Jacquard

Ela eh azul, ela eh bela, sobretudo ela eh pequena.
E nos nao a abandonaremos.
Albert Jacquard


A Terra Vista do Ceu eh um impressionante retrato do nosso planeta.
O fotografo frances Yann Arthus-Bertrand conseguiu capturar o espetaculo bruto, natural e intimidante do mundo em que vivemos. Desde que suas fotografias foram exibidas pela primeira vez em Paris, em 2000, A Terra Vista do Ceu viajou por mais de 30 paises e foi vista por mais de 50 milhoes de pessoas.
Com limpidez digital, o DVD A Terra Vista do Ceu faz o observador submergir na beleza e nas maravilhas do nosso planeta.
Uma obra de reconciliacao entre o Homem e a Natureza, este filme nos convida a refletir sobre as mudancas que acontecem no planeta e nas repercussoes destas mudancas para os futuros habitantes.
Uma a uma, as imagens estonteantes revelam nao apenas a beleza da Terra mas tambem o nosso impacto sobre este fragil planeta.

Find the places via Google Earth: http://earth.google.com/intl/pt-BR/earthfromabove/
